Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 44th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1981...
Injured on 4/26/1981 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
Traded from New York (N) to Cincinnati on 2/5/1984 (Going to CIN: P M. Moore. Going to NYM: C S. Chilcott, P D. Ward)...
Injured on 5/24/1984 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Earned first career win on 5/10/1985...
Traded from Cincinnati to St. Louis on 7/7/1985 (Going to CIN: P B. Blyleven. Going to STL: CF C. Davis, P M. Moore)...
Injured on 8/3/1986 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 5/15/1987 with a Concussion, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/3/1991 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/21/1991 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 9/17/1992 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/9/1993 to a 2-year deal worth $4,500,000 per year...
